Text:
why in this and other torrent when i install, there is no subtitle line --- save as in subtitle editor ?

HElp, is there any good version out with this feature that works ?

Instead of the "save" button I had on my former version, on the lower right of the subtitles window, it appears only "Add a new subtitle line". The "save" button is gone and I can't find it nowhere! Is this a bug?
